title: Rico Men's Modern Tank Top
description: WHAT'S INCLUDED: 3 Rico Men's Modern Cotton Tank Tops. Choose from all black pack or a black and grey pack. The sizes are available in: Small, Medium, Large and X-Large.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: Made from 100% cotton, these tank tops have quick dry elements to provide you with the ultimate comfort.
FEATURES: Smooth to the touch, the fibers in these tank tops provide a soft touch. Lightweight and breathable, the style is fitted to your body.
SUPERIOR DESIGN: Comfort fit and fitted to the body, these modern tank tops are designed with a round neck and thin straps.
HOW TO WASH: Washer and dryer safe! Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Drip dry reccomended. Do not iron.

Rico's Men's Cotton Modern Tank Top is ideal for going the extra distance, thanks to the resilient fabric that's lightweight and breathable, but can really take a licking. Wear for any high-performance activity.
